nodes.text: Pols Anaxes was the capital city of Anaxes. Home to the Anaxes Citadel, it was the planet's primary civilian spaceport. The city and surrounding terraced Sirpar Hills were places of utmost grace and nearly all motorized vehicles were banned. It was a system of underground access tubes that allowed speeders and groundcars to get to and from destinations. Aboveground, only quiet hover-limos and Keffi-drawn carriages were used.
It was also home to one of the Republic Detention Centers. The detention center was led by the 55th Mechanized Infantry by the time of 19 BBY.
